document_data.caption: A map showing Sundice in central Sossal.
document_data.name: Sundice
document_data.mainbody: '''Sundice''' was a small settlement found in [[Sossal]] in the [[Cold Lands]] of [[northeast Faer√ªn]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1bIc}}
document_data.Geography: Sundice was located in central Sossal in the shadow of [[Mount Sundabar]], which lay to the southeast. Sundice was connected to [[Naupau]] in the east and [[Dharvil]] in the west by an unnamed road.
